verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace
Whose mind is stayed on Thee, (x3)
For he trusteth, he trusteth in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Open ye gates that the righteous nation that
Keepeth the truth, may enter in, may enter in. (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In that day shall this song be sung
In the land of Judah, (x3)
We have a strong city.
